body.title: Migration helpers
body.elms:
create_table :users do |t|
      t.database_authenticatable
      t.confirmable
      t.recoverable
      t.rememberable
      t.trackable
      t.timestamps
    end

Routing
-------

body.title: Authenticated and unauthenticated routes
body.elms:
unauthenticated do
       root :to => 'home#index'
    end

    authenticated do
      root :to => 'dashboard#index'
    end

body.title: Devise_for magic
Customizing devise_for
body.elms:
devise_for :users,
      :path => "usuarios",
      :path_names => {
        :sign_in => 'login',
        :sign_out => 'logout',
        :password => 'secret',
        :confirmation => 'verification',
        :unlock => 'unblock',
        :registration => 'register',
        :sign_up => 'cmon_let_me_in' }
